## Instructor: Sean Sylvia, Ph.D.

Sean Sylvia is an Associate Professor in the Department of Health Policy and Management in the Gillings School of Global Public Health at UNC Chapel Hill.

**Office Hours:** Dr. Sylvia will hold office hours on Wednesdays from 1-2pm. Please book an appointment at least 24 hours ahead of time using this [LINK](https://calendly.com/sean-sylvia/hpm-883-office-hours).
